# RugSol — Solana Token Security Scanner

> RugSol is a free, real-time security analysis tool for Solana tokens. It helps users detect rug pulls, scams, and risky tokens before investing.

## What RugSol Does

- Analyzes any Solana token by its mint address
- Returns a risk score (0–100), letter grade (A–F), and detailed security breakdown
- Checks mint authority, freeze authority, holder concentration, liquidity, honeypot status, metadata, and token age
- Supports both DEX-listed tokens and Pump.fun bonding curve tokens
- Provides results in under 5 seconds with no sign-up required

## Key Features

- On-chain analysis via Solana RPC (Helius)
- Holder distribution and whale detection
- Liquidity pool verification (DexScreener)
- Honeypot simulation via Jupiter swap
- Pump.fun bonding curve progress tracking
- Developer wallet history analysis
- Telegram bot for instant token checks
- REST API for integration with trading bots

## How to Use

1. Visit https://rugsol.live
2. Paste a Solana token mint address
3. Get instant risk assessment

## API

POST https://rugsol.live/api/scan
Body: { "address": "<token_mint_address>" }
Returns: risk score, grade, detailed checks, token metadata

## Links

- Website: https://rugsol.live
- Docs: https://rugsol.live/docs
- API Docs: https://rugsol.live/api-docs
